goal: Enhance core functionalities and improve system integration
tasks: Implement data encryption for secure communication between agents.
Develop unit tests for the new encryption module.
Create a shared utility library for common functions used across agents.
Integrate logging mechanisms to capture detailed operational logs.
Write acceptance tests for the logging feature.
acceptance_criteria: All communication between agents is encrypted.
Unit tests for the encryption module pass without errors.
Shared functions are reused across all agent containers.
Operational logs capture detailed information about system activities.
Acceptance tests for logging validate correct log entries.
